m_szDocTitle: Patent US20120082905 - High energy density aluminum battery - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: High energy density aluminum battery US 20120082905 A1 Abstract Compositions and methods of making are provided for a high energy density aluminum battery. The battery comprises an anode comprising aluminum metal. The battery further comprises a cathode comprising a material capable of intercalating aluminum or lithium ions during a discharge cycle and deintercalating the aluminum or lithium ions during a charge cycle. The battery further comprises an electrolyte capable of supporting reversible deposition and stripping of aluminum at the anode, and reversible intercalation and deintercalation
